content: these sweet little baby mitts are knit within a few hours and are a wonderful last minute gift just take some leftovers of a nice fingering weight yarn 15 g for the gloves 5 g for the icord and have a nice knitting afternoon the mitts are knit in the round and the last stitches are grafted together the icord is knit separately in contrasting yarn and sewn to the folded cuff measurements width 6 cm circumference 12 cm length with folded hem 8 cm
